title: Angel Kemory
description: In 1973, a mysterious child enters Millie’s life. First as a long-haired child in a dress known as Kemory, and then as an adorable little boy named Kipp. No matter what Social Services concludes about Kipp’s unfortunate past, Millie is assured there is no reason to think he won’t grow up to be a normal young man.Trapped in the form of a young human boy, the mischievous Angel Kemory struggles with mental restraints, and forming an unfamiliar bond as someone’s son. Using his natural talents, he charms his way on to television in an effort to find a solution to end his mortal predicament.
author: Jo Banks
